A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I was glad to see the story was a little more original; that it wasn’t just a complete reboot of a previous episode (like The Force Awakens). However\, they didn’t capitalize on the main idea behind the story. Overall it felt very loose and thrown together without much substance. A lot of useless subplot added\, and forced humor. Don’t get me wrong\, it wasn’t all bad. There were a few scenes that definitely made my hair stand out of excitement. I was entertained\, but sorely disappointed. I’ve seen worse movies for sure\, but this is one of the worst if not the worst Star Wars.
